code: import*as priceConstants from'./../constants/prices';/** add price list api */export var addprice=function addprice(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return{type:priceConstants.ADD_PRICE,payload:{params:params}};};export var addpriceFailed=function addpriceFailed(error){return{type:priceConstants.ADD_PRICE_FAILED,payload:{error:error}};};export var addpriceSuccess=function addpriceSuccess(data){return{type:priceConstants.ADD_PRICE_SUCCESS,payload:{data:data}};};/** refesh price list api */export var refeshprice=function refeshprice(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return{type:priceConstants.REFESH_PRICE,payload:{params:params}};};export var refeshpriceFailed=function refeshpriceFailed(error){return{type:priceConstants.REFESH_PRICE_FAILED,payload:{error:error}};};export var refeshpriceSuccess=function refeshpriceSuccess(data){return{type:priceConstants.REFESH_PRICE_SUCCESS,payload:{data:data}};};
